attributes.action: Reduce the noise nuisance caused by emergency vehicle sirens by immediately reducing their volume and restricting their hours of use from 7am to 7.30pm. In the longer term to find a technological fix whereby vehicles in the vicinity of an emergency vehicle can be alerted without disturbing the rest of the neighbourhood..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As traffic congestion has increased so has the frequency and volume of sirens used by emergency vehicles. It is not unusual to hear sirens at 2am. Sirens are now so loud they could be affecting peoples health and wellbeing by causing loss of sleep, damage to hearing and anxiety.
